name: hardwired

computing
  specialized A computer or electronic device that is hardwired is built to work in a particular way and you cannot change the way it performs with new software, etc.
informal If someone or something is hardwired to do a particular thing, they automatically do it and cannot change that behaviour: Humans are hardwired to love fattening foods.
